# Setup

```
$ pip install -e .
```

# Usage

```
>>> from pytorch_bezier_mnist import BezierMNIST, beziers_to_svg
>>> dataset = BezierMNIST(data_dir='./data', split='train)
>>> beziers, label = dataset[0]
>>> label
5
>>> beziers
[[[(7.487405678731406, 24.730409349387557), (10.730467365569888, 25.108273957460934), (15.377418541186042, 21.968913655382508), (17.935017539923113, 20.22314831839828)], [(17.935017539923113, 20.22314831839828), (17.80461518063881, 20.31215833084038), (20.323270284018825, 18.542617433132055), (18.630488801986868, 16.01066029468999)], [(18.630488801986868, 16.01066029468999), (17.38597749346176, 14.149197769881615), (11.59477262660412, 11.199599980864258), (15.721487599987233, 9.446954990565569)], [(15.721487599987233, 9.446954990565569), (26.299623342744518, 4.954346042328934), (19.682775348350468, 5.082065081949215), (15.422377721286109, 5.811253544529208)], [(15.422377721286109, 5.811253544529208), (13.680050130711445, 6.109461666938026), (6.490843842845628, 6.813799047493847), (10.378701362491627, 10.106336646543337)], [(10.378701362491627, 10.106336646543337), (10.769896447067026, 10.437630815123137), (12.233572642963594, 12.59915523489899), (13.424208824758013, 13.81668576387136)], [(13.424208824758013, 13.81668576387136), (16.269052722280154, 16.725789609660584), (17.146012532297807, 17.334270822535156), (11.694872035284886, 20.44622525441384)], [(11.694872035284886, 20.44622525441384), (9.314424809157822, 21.805178174313586), (2.4389656700503792, 24.14219148939308), (7.487405678731406, 24.730409349387557)]]]
>>> beziers_to_svg(beziers)
